infos.value: Lord Mont, let us aim to level up your skills as a warrior, your Main Job.
Let us aim to level up your skills as a warrior. You have now acquired the knowledge necessary to do so.
As your job level has risen, you can now acquire new abilities. Let us review them at once.
Congratulations on acquiring a new ability! Now, let's go further and enhance it.
Though you currently possess only a few types of abilities, I am looking forward to witnessing your growth and seeing you master a diverse array of skills, Lord Mont.
I have prepared the necessary ores, so go ahead and use them.
• Enhancing Main Jobs •

• Enhancing Main Jobs •
Gather enough of the necessary ores and you can enhance your unit's Main Job.
• Enhancing Main Jobs II •
As the Main Job's <color=#00ffff>level</color> increases, <color=#00ffff>bonuses</color> will be applied to the unit's <color=#00ffff>stats</color>...
• Enhancing Main Jobs III •
...and sometimes <color=#00ffff>new abilities</color> can even be <color=#00ffff>unlocked</color>.
• Acquiring Abilities •

• Ability Board •
Acquiring abilities requires JP and gil. JP and gil can be acquired during battle.
• Enhancing Abilities •

• Enhancing Abilities •
Enhancing abilities also requires JP and gil. Enhancing will increase the damage dealt by attack-type abilities...
• Enhancing Abilities •
...<color=#00ffff>augment the effects</color> of debuff abilities, and <color=#00ffff>boost</color> the infliction <color=#00ffff>rate</color> of status ailment abilities.
• Main Jobs •
Proceed to a tutorial on Main Jobs?
Yes
No
